amendment.description: To amend title 31, United States Code, to provide for automatic continuing resolutions.

action.text: Motion to table amendment SA 7 agreed to in Senate by Yea-Nay Vote. 52 - 46. Record Vote Number: 7.
Amendment SA 7 proposed by Senator Portman.
Senate amendment proposed (on the floor): Amendment SA 7 proposed by Senator Portman.
Roll call votes on amendments in Senate: Motion to table amendment SA 7 agreed to in Senate by Yea-Nay Vote. 52 - 46. Record Vote Number: 7.
